about_the_game:
Welcome to Pack Lunch! The game where you pack lunch...

But you're a very organised person, aren't you? You prepared it the night before. So all you had to do was remember to take it out of the fridge.

You left the house in plenty of time and triple-checked the front door was locked behind you. On the bottom step you felt for your keys, wallet, phone, and the rounded corner of your plastic lunchbox through your bag lining. It was all there. You breathed a sigh of accomplishment, confident that you were in control.

Think again!

Because existence is chaos. Your lunchbox has come open and all the food has fallen out. You're certain the lid was closed properly when you picked it up but it isn't the first time this has happened (or the last) and you don't know what to believe anymore.

You empty your bag and start haphazardly refilling your lunchbox, only to find that it doesn't all fit anymore. What is that yo-yo doing in there?

So here we are.

Just do your best and fit as much food in as you can without any overlapping. With some trial and error, and a little luck, you should be able to get almost everything back in.

And don't give up. The solution is never more than a few 90° rotations away.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Eye-catching (and mouth-watering!) pixel-art designs:
    Over 50 unique food shapes in 40 unique (often abstract) designs; more than a dozen non-food shapes; a variety of colourful lunch boxes and baskets; and over 20 vibrant (and occasionally entrancing) level backgrounds. A real treat for the eyes!

  • Plenty of content to sink your teeth into (and still leave you hungry for more?):
    Over 70 levels spread across 6 stages AND a random level selector, for when you can't make up your mind.

  • Requires only two buttons to play:
    Mouse controls picking up, dragging and shape placement. Spacebar controls rotation. Easy-peasy.

  • Vibe check:
    Choose between two original compositions: a cheerful sunny theme or a sombre rainy theme (or neither, it's up to you); to match your mood, or artfully compliment the weather outside.

  • No skips:
    Old-school progression. Complete a level to unlock the next one. You can do it!

name: Pack Lunch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core or other low-end processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Fill your lunchbox to the brim with a variety of colourfully designed fruit, sandwiches, snacks, and more, in this vibrant 2D puzzle game with over 70 levels. Drag and rotate to discover which shapes fit, and which don't, as you try to complete each grid.
